page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This is our first page to the Doomsday Project.We are covering a rectangle of four by three kilometres at a location of {03600312}. The district contains a few small villages i.e. {Admaston,Rushmoor, {Wrockwardine,Bratton}and{Allscott . The area dates back to the 16th century but most buildings have been built in the 20th century.i.e { {Admaston estate Admaston was originally built in{1869 and later in the 1900's. In the 1900's Admaston was mostly farms and cattle grazing land.Since then Admaston has grown rapidly.
